gameBlurb: Escape Vimension is a 3D puzzle platformer where you play as a programmer trapped inside the bizarre world of Vim. A dangeon where keyboard commands become physical actions. Shrunk down to the size of a microbe, your only way back to reality is to master Vim. Move with h, j, k, l, manipulate objects with x and y, and solve puzzles by chaining commands to overcome obstacles, outsmart enemies, and explore floating islands filled with interactive environments.
